## Objective


```{r set-options, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
options(height = 10)
```

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(CountClust)
```


## Preparing data

Load results that were computed on PPS.

```{r}
load("../rdas/topics.omega.16.rda")
```


Make annotation matrix.

```{r}
samples_id <- read.table("../rdas/samples_id.txt")[,3]
str(samples_id)

annotation <- data.frame(
     sample_id = paste0("X", c(1:NROW(omega))),
     tissue_label = samples_id)
rownames(omega) <- annotation$sample_id
```


## Making Structure plot

```{r, fig.height=15}
cols1 <- c(rev(RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(12, "Paired"))[c(3,4,7,8,11,12,5,6,9,10)],
           RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(12, "Set3"))

#pdf(file = "plots/gtex-figures/gtex-k16.pdf", height = 14, width = 7)
    StructureGGplot(omega = omega,
                 annotation = annotation,
                 palette = cols1,
                 yaxis_label = "Tissue",
                 order_sample = TRUE,
                 split_line = list(split_lwd = .3,
                                   split_col = "white"),
                 axis_tick = list(axis_ticks_length = .1,
                                  axis_ticks_lwd_y = .1,
                                  axis_ticks_lwd_x = .1,
                                  axis_label_size = 7,
                                  axis_label_face = "bold"))
#dev.off()
```
